Package com.simon.simontree.api

Class ModificationBinaryTreeOperations

java.lang.Object
com.simon.simontree.api.ModificationBinaryTreeOperations
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModificationBinaryTreeInterface, ModificationBinaryTreeOperationsInterface
public class ModificationBinaryTreeOperations extends Object implements ModificationBinaryTreeOperationsInterface, ModificationBinaryTreeInterface
Provides all the needed operations for working with the binary tree ModificationBinaryTree, which consist Modifications and Modificationgroups. Some-methods use paralellstream for better performance. Uses the helper methods from HelperMethods, This is the control panel for the ModificationBinaryTree with tree traversal, search, and various sorting functionalities. Control the binary tree ModificationBinaryTree via this class.

Implements the interface ModificationBinaryTreeOperationsInterface and ModificationBinaryTreeInterface Usage: 1., First create Set, accepts any type of Collection, to insert single elements use Collections.singleton() 2., add to ModificationGroup, via the constructor 3., instantiate ModificationBinaryTree with preferred sorting logic (based on name, based on priority value, based on total cost in Modification, use the enum TreeLogic) 4., add ModificationGroups to ModificationBinaryTree 5., Instantiate ModificationBinaryTreeOperations, pass ModificationBinaryTree to constructor 6., use insert() method of ModificationBinaryTreeOperations instance to add a ModificationGroups

Null checks:

  • null-checked queuOfModificationGroups
  • null-checked setOfAllModifications

Key characteristics:

  • Level-based element retrieval
  • Cost and priority calculations
  • Sorting operations for modifications and groups
  • Thread-safe operations
See Also:
  • ModificationBinaryTreeInterface
  • ModificationBinaryTreeOperationsInterface
  • ModificationGroup
  • Modification

      public Set<Modification> getModificationsOfGivenModificationGroupAndItsChildren(ModificationGroup modificationGroup) throws NoSuchElementException
      Returns a Set of all Modification of the given ModificationGroup and its children. It uses BFS. This only calls the method in the ModificationBinaryTree class.
      Specified by:
      getModificationsOfGivenModificationGroupAndItsChildren in interface ModificationBinaryTreeInterface
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - The ModificationGroup, which will be investigated
      Returns:
      Set of all Modification of this ModificationGroup and its' children
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if modificationGroup is null
      NoSuchElementException - if the group is not found in the tree

      Set of all Modification of this ModificationGroup and its' children

    • getTreePath

      public String getTreePath(ModificationGroup modificationGroup)
      Description copied from interface: ModificationBinaryTreeInterface
      Returns the hierarchical path of a ModificationGroup in the tree structure. The path is constructed using group names separated by " / " (e.g., "Root / Europe / Hungary").
      Specified by:
      getTreePath in interface ModificationBinaryTreeInterface
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - The group to locate (non-null)
      Returns:
      The full path in the tree, or an empty string if not found
